name: Ayoub Visual novel Episode 1
description:
The eight students of the elite class find themselves going up against a mysterious masked individual with unclear, and potentially dangerous motives. 

Be careful not to lose!

Features:

  • An exciting and fast-paced story
  • Cool new graphics
  • More than 40 backgrounds and 18 CGs
  • Expressive music
  • A gallery for viewing unlocked CGs
